content: Hey {wife_name}, just wanted to remind you that you married the funny one. You're welcome.
{wife_name}, I love you more than pizza. And you know how serious that is.
Good morning, {wife_name}! I made coffee. Just kidding, I made a mess. But I thought about making coffee.
{wife_name}, you're the reason I check myself out in the mirror less. Because looking at you is way better.
I love you more than my phone, {wife_name}. Don't tell my phone.
{wife_name}, thanks for pretending to laugh at my jokes. It means the world to me.
Roses are red, violets are blue, I'm not great at poems, but I sure love you, {wife_name}.
{wife_name}, you're the cheese to my macaroni. Cheesy, I know. But true.
I was going to send you something romantic, {wife_name}, but then I remembered you married ME. So here's this instead.
{wife_name}, if loving you is wrong, I don't want to be right. Also, what's for dinner?
Hey {wife_name}, are you a parking ticket? Because you've got fine written all over you.
{wife_name}, I love you even when you steal all the blankets.
Just thinking about you, {wife_name}. And snacks. Mostly you though. Okay, 50/50.
{wife_name}, you're my favorite person to be weird with.
I love you, {wife_name}. Even when you use all the hot water.
{wife_name}, if we were both socks, we'd make a great pair.
You're the peanut butter to my jelly, {wife_name}. Sticky but sweet.
{wife_name}, I love you more than I love not doing chores. That's a lot.
Hey {wife_name}, remember when you thought I was charming? Good times.
{wife_name}, you're the only person I'd share my fries with. That's true love.
I love you more than yesterday, {wife_name}. Yesterday you really annoyed me. Kidding!
{wife_name}, thanks for being my partner in crime. And by crime, I mean eating snacks at midnight.
You're my favorite notification, {wife_name}. Even better than food delivery updates.
{wife_name}, I'd pick you over Wi-Fi. And that's saying something.
Hey {wife_name}, you're stuck with me forever. Sorry not sorry.
{wife_name}, you're the avocado to my toast. Expensive but worth it.
I love you even when you ask me what I'm thinking and I say 'nothing' and mean it, {wife_name}.
{wife_name}, you're my favorite person to binge-watch shows with.
If you were a vegetable, {wife_name}, you'd be a cute-cumber.
{wife_name}, I love you more than I love hitting snooze. And that's saying A LOT.
Hey {wife_name}, I'd brave IKEA on a Saturday for you. That's real love.
{wife_name}, you're my favorite human. Don't tell the dog.
I love you more than coffee, {wife_name}. Just not before I've had my coffee.
{wife_name}, thanks for always laughing at my jokes even when they're terrible.
You had me at 'I'll order us some food,' {wife_name}.
{wife_name}, you're the reason I smile. And also the reason for my grey hairs. Love you!
I love you, {wife_name}. Even when you take forever to pick a restaurant.
{wife_name}, if love is blind, why do I still think you're gorgeous?
Hey {wife_name}, are you a campfire? Because you're hot and I want s'more.
{wife_name}, you're my favorite weirdo.
I'd let you have the last slice of pizza, {wife_name}. That's how much I love you.
{wife_name}, thanks for putting up with me. I know it's a full-time job.
You're the only person I'd share my Netflix password with, {wife_name}.
{wife_name}, I love you even when you correct my grammar.
Hey {wife_name}, you're like a dictionary. You add meaning to my life.
{wife_name}, you're my favorite reason to lose sleep.
I love you more than bacon, {wife_name}. And bacon is pretty amazing.
{wife_name}, thanks for always being on my team. Even when I'm wrong.
You're the only one I'd share my charger with when I'm at 5%, {wife_name}.
{wife_name}, you're the reason I don't need a dating app anymore. You're welcome.
I love how you pretend not to notice when I leave the toilet seat up, {wife_name}.
{wife_name}, you're my favorite person to do nothing with.
Hey {wife_name}, I think you're spec-tacular. Yes, that was a glasses pun.
{wife_name}, you're the best thing that ever happened to my laundry. It actually gets done now.
I love you more than sleeping in, {wife_name}. And sleeping in is pretty great.
{wife_name}, you make me want to be a better man. No pressure or anything.
Hey {wife_name}, are you my phone? Because I look at you all day long.
{wife_name}, you're the only person I'd skip leg day for. Just kidding, I always skip leg day.
I love you, {wife_name}. Even when you hog the remote.
{wife_name}, you're my emergency contact and my emergency snack buddy.
Hey {wife_name}, you're like a software update. I wasn't ready for you, but you made everything better.
{wife_name}, thanks for not killing me in my sleep when I snore.
I love you more than free shipping, {wife_name}. And I REALLY love free shipping.
{wife_name}, you're my favorite adventure buddy. And by adventure, I mean Target runs.
Hey {wife_name}, I'm no photographer, but I can picture us together forever.
{wife_name}, you're the reason I look forward to coming home. Also, the couch.
I love you even when you say 'we need to talk,' {wife_name}. Okay, maybe especially then.
{wife_name}, you're my favorite distraction from adulting.
Hey {wife_name}, if you were a triangle, you'd be acute one.
{wife_name}, you make every day feel like a weekend. Except Monday. Nothing can fix Monday.
I love you more than the gym, {wife_name}. Which explains a lot.
{wife_name}, you're the best decision my heart ever made. My brain is still catching up.
Hey {wife_name}, you're like a fine wine. You get better with time. And also I want more of you.
{wife_name}, thanks for not judging my midnight snacking habits.
I love you, {wife_name}. Even when you put cold feet on me in bed.
{wife_name}, you're my favorite excuse to leave parties early.
Hey {wife_name}, are you a bank loan? Because you've got my interest.
{wife_name}, you're the only one I'd give my last chicken nugget to.
I love how you laugh at me, {wife_name}. Wait, I mean with me. Right?
{wife_name}, you're my favorite person to be lazy with.
Hey {wife_name}, you're hotter than my laptop after I've been gaming for 5 hours.
{wife_name}, thanks for being my person. Even when I'm being a handful.
I love you more than tacos, {wife_name}. And Tuesday is taco day, so that's saying a lot.
{wife_name}, you're the reason I try to look presentable. Keyword: try.
Hey {wife_name}, if I had a flower for every time you made me smile, I'd have a garden.
{wife_name}, you're my favorite person to share dessert with. Mostly.
I love you even when you ask me to hold your purse in public, {wife_name}.
{wife_name}, you're the best thing since sliced bread. And I really like sandwiches.
Hey {wife_name}, are you a magician? Because whenever I look at you, everyone else disappears.
{wife_name}, you're my favorite notification. Better than pizza delivery alerts.
I love how you put up with my shenanigans, {wife_name}.
{wife_name}, you're the only one who truly gets my weirdness.
Hey {wife_name}, you're proof that God has a sense of humor. He gave me someone way out of my league.
{wife_name}, thanks for always finding my keys. And my phone. And my sanity.
I love you more than the weekend, {wife_name}. And that's my favorite time.
{wife_name}, you're the reason I don't just eat cereal for every meal.
Hey {wife_name}, are you an interior decorator? Because when I saw you, the room became beautiful.
{wife_name}, you're my favorite person. Even when you're hangry.
I love you, {wife_name}. Even more than I love complaining about Mondays.
{wife_name}, you're the only one I want to annoy for the rest of my life.
